abstract: Jesse Tortora, a former stock analyst, testified at the criminal trial of his one-time boss at Diamondback, Todd Newman, and Anthony Chiasson, the co-founder of the hedge fund Level Global.
snippet: Jesse Tortora, a former stock analyst, testified at the criminal trial of his one-time boss at Diamondback, Todd Newman, and Anthony Chiasson, the co-founder of the hedge fund Level Global.
lead_paragraph: In 2008, Jesse Tortora, a junior tech-stock analyst, made $2.25 million, his best year at the hedge fund Diamondback Capital Management.

headline.main: On Witness Stand, Former Analyst Describes Insider Trading Scheme
